</div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addBodyAd('methodad')</script>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Taking_Care_of_Your_Hair_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>2</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Taking_Care_of_Your_Hair">Taking Care of Your Hair</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_2">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-10-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-10-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-10-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-10-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_06b2ebd354" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_06b2ebd354')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 10" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/03/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-10-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-10-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Wash your hair, but not every day.</b> It may sound gross, but washing you hair every 2 to 3 days (instead of every day) actually leads to healthier hair. If you wash your hair every day, you will strip it of its healthy oils. This results in hair that looks dry, brittle, and ratty.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 9" class="reference" id="_ref-9"><a href="#_note-9">[9]</a></sup> If your hair tends to look oily, consider wearing it in a <a href="/Do-a-Basic-Hair-Braid" title="Do a Basic Hair Braid">braid</a>, <a href="/Make-a-Ponytail" title="Make a Ponytail">ponytail</a>, or <a href="/Make-a-Bun" title="Make a Bun">bun</a> on the second or third day.

<ul>
<li>If you exercise a lot, have fine hair, or have oily hair, then you may need to wash your hair every day or every other day with a gentle shampoo and conditioner.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 10" class="reference" id="_ref-10"><a href="#_note-10">[10]</a></sup>
</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-11-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-11-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/aa/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-11-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-11-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_ad78b0acc6" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_ad78b0acc6')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 11" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/a/aa/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-11-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-11-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Wash your hair properly.</b> Focus the shampoo on your scalp and the top to middle of your hair. Gently massage it into your scalp using your fingertips—never "scratch" your scalp with your nails. After rinsing the shampoo out, apply the conditioner, focusing it on the ends of your hair. This will keep your hair from turning dry and your scalp from becoming oily.

<ul>
<li>Use the right type of shampoo and conditioner for your hair. Again, not everything that works for your friend may work for you.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-12-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-12-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e3/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-12-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-12-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_4d5a242db0" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_4d5a242db0')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 12" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e3/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-12-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-12-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Brush your hair properly to prevent frizz and snags.</b> Don't brush your hair straight down from the roots to the ends at first. This can make your hair snap and break. Instead, work in small sections, starting from the ends of your hair. Once the rest of your hair is smooth, only then can you run the brush from roots to ends.

<ul>
<li>If you have curly or natural hair, use a wide-toothed comb instead. This will have further prevent frizz.</li>
<li>You <i>can</i> still use a hairbrush if your hair is curly or naturally frizzy, but only just before you wash it.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-13-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-13-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5f/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-13-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-13-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_b9fbdc93c7" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_b9fbdc93c7')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 13" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/5f/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-13-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-13-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Skip the daily heat styling, and use a good heat protectant when you do.</b> Not only can daily straightening or curling look boring after a while, but it can do a lot of damage to your hair. When you <i>do</i> heat style your hair (ie: straightening or curling), apply a heat protectant spray or serum to your hair. This protects your hair from getting burnt and prevents it from looking dry.

<ul>
<li>Having a bad hair day with unmanageable frizz? Try braids. They are much gentler on your hair than straightening, and take much less time to do.</li>
<li>Consider <a href="/Curl-Your-Hair-Without-Heat" title="Curl Your Hair Without Heat">no-heat methods</a> when curling your hair. They may take longer, but they will be better for your hair.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-14-Version-2.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-14-Version-2.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ef/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-14-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-14-Version-2.jpg" height="546" id="img_457f6fda9c" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_457f6fda9c')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 14" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/ef/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-14-Version-2.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-14-Version-2.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Stay away from products that contain silicones and sulfates.</b> Silicones are great at making your hair appear sleek, smooth, and shiny, but they can cause build-up over time, which results in dull, lank, and limp hair. They can only be removed with sulfates, which are harsh cleaning agents that make your hair appear dull and dry.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 11" class="reference" id="_ref-11"><a href="#_note-11">[11]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>When shopping for hair products, look for labels that say "sulfate-free." If the label doesn't say anything, check the ingredients list on the back of the bottle.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-15.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-15.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/df/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-15.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-15.jpg" height="546" id="img_b171b1b780" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_b171b1b780')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 15" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/d/df/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-15.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-15.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Try a <a href="/Make-Your-Hair-Silky-and-Shiny-with-Vinegar" title="Make Your Hair Silky and Shiny with Vinegar">vinegar rinse</a>.</b> It may sound gross, but the soft hair you'll get afterwards is well worth it. Vinegar cleans out any buildup in your hair as well as restores its natural pH. The result is soft, shiny, smooth hair. Mix ½ to 4 tablespoons of apple cider vinegar in 1 cup (240 milliliters) of water, then pour it over your hair towards the end of your shower. Follow up with a cool water rinse to close the cuticles and maximize shine.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 12" class="reference" id="_ref-12"><a href="#_note-12">[12]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>Be sure to tilt your head back and close your eyes so that you don't get any vinegar in your eyes.</li>
<li>Don't worry, the smell will go away once your hair dries.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-16.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-16.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/16/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-16.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-16.jpg" height="546" id="img_1fd2ba5c8d" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_1fd2ba5c8d')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 16" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/1/16/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-16.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-16.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 7" class="step_num">7</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_7"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Try a <a href="/Make-an-Olive-Oil-Hair-Mask" title="Make an Olive Oil Hair Mask">hair mask</a> if you have dry or damaged hair.</b> Hair masks are like rich conditioners that help soften, hydrate, and moisturize your hair. Each brand varies, but you generally apply them after shampooing your hair, then leave them on (preferably under a shower cap) for 10 to 15 minutes. After that, you rinse them out; you don't have to use conditioner.

<ul>
<li>You can buy these masks from a beauty supply shop, or <a href="/Make-a-Hair-Mask" title="Make a Hair Mask">you can make them yourself</a>.</li>
<li>When choosing a hair mask, look for one that is made for your hair type or condition. For example, if you have damaged hair, look for a label that says "for damaged hair."</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-17.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-17.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 17" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bc/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-17.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-17.jpg" height="546" id="img_3de784670e" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_3de784670e')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 17" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/b/bc/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-17.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-17.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 8" class="step_num">8</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_2_8"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Take advantage of your hair's natural texture.</b> It is much easier to embrace your hair than to fight against it. Visit a hair stylist, and ask him or her to help you choose a hairstyle that suits your face shape and hair texture.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
<div id="tocad_wrap">
<div class="wh_ad_inner step_ad" data-adsenseheight="90" data-adsensewidth="728" data-adtargetid="tocad" data-adunitpath="" data-aps-timeout="2000" data-channels="6381149051,4805470868" data-lateload="1" data-loaded="0" data-service="adsense" data-slot="3356467874" data-viewablerefresh="1" id="tocad_outer"><div class="step_ad" id="tocad"></div></div>
<div class="clearall adclear"></div>
<script>WH.desktopAds.addTOCAd('tocad')</script>
</div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Taking_Care_of_Your_Body_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>3</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Taking_Care_of_Your_Body">Taking Care of Your Body</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_3">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-18.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-18.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 18" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2e/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-18.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-18.jpg" height="546" id="img_11b5df503c" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_11b5df503c')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 18" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/2e/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-18.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-18.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Stay hydrated.</b> Drink at least 6 to 8 glasses (8 ounces/240 milliliters each) every day. This will cleanse out any impurities in your skin, and give it a healthy glow. It also helps keep off water weight, which is caused when your body becomes dehydrated and stores extra water.

<ul>
<li>You should drink more water if it is very hot or if you are exercising a lot.</li>
<li>Pace yourself. Don't drink huge amounts of water at one time.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-19.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-19.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 19" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/24/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-19.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-19.jpg" height="546" id="img_2438a71e72" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_2438a71e72')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 19" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/24/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-19.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-19.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Eat well and eat healthy.</b> Skipping meals is one of the worst things you can do to yourself, and it can actually cause you to <i>gain</i> weight, because your body enters starvation mode. You should eat 3 full meals each day, and 2 to 3 snacks in between. Be sure to eat a well-balanced diet, filled with healthy grains, lean meats, and lots of fruits and vegetables.

<ul>
<li>If you are vegetarian, you can get protein through eggs, dairy products, beans, and nuts.</li>
<li>If you are vegan, get protein through beans, nuts, and soy products. Try to eat some meat, egg, or dairy every once in a while, however; your body is still developing.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-20.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-20.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 20" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/59/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-20.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-20.jpg" height="546" id="img_7d68691100" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_7d68691100')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 20" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/59/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-20.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-20.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Exercise to stay fit and lift your mood.</b> This does not mean that you have to hit the gym and start weightlifting. Even a simple 30 minute walk each day can help keep you in shape. Not only will you be keeping fit, but you will be relaxing your mind. You may even find yourself feeling a little less stressed afterwards.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 13" class="reference" id="_ref-13"><a href="#_note-13">[13]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>If walking doesn't suit you, try doing something active that you enjoy, such as: jazz dance, ballet, sports, martial arts, jogging, or even yoga.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 14" class="reference" id="_ref-14"><a href="#_note-14">[14]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>If you are trying to lose weight, be patient, and try not to worry. Many girls find that their weight fluctuates during puberty. Weight loss also takes time.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-21.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-21.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 21" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f6/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-21.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-21.jpg" height="546" id="img_bf2bb438f5" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_bf2bb438f5')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 21" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/f6/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-21.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-21.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Get 8½ to 9½ hours of sleep enough night.</b> That may sound like a lot, but it is important. There's a reason it's called "beauty sleep" after all. Not getting enough sleep causes more than just bags under your eyes. It can also lead to things like mood swings, depression, or anxiety. It can also make your skin look dull and your weight to increase.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 15" class="reference" id="_ref-15"><a href="#_note-15">[15]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>Make sure that your room is at a comfortable temperature, and avoid using electronics at least 1 hour before bedtime.</li>
<li>If you are having troubles getting to sleep, speak with your doctor. It could be a medical condition.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-22.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-22.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 22" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/87/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-22.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-22.jpg" height="546" id="img_ab3c8732ac" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_ab3c8732ac')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 22" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/8/87/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-22.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-22.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_3_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Practice self-love to boost your confidence and self-esteem.</b> If you feel ashamed and insecure about your appearance, take a look in the mirror, and find at least <i>one</i> aspect of yourself that you like. It does not have to be big; it can be very simple, such as the shape of your nose, your freckles, or the color of your eye. Do this every day.

<ul>
<li>A positive attitude will allow you to see the good things about yourself. A negative attitude only allows you to see your flaws.</li>
<li>By boosting your self-esteem, you may eventually stop seeing your flaws, and start seeing the true beauty that you actually are.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Enhancing_Your_Beauty_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>4</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Enhancing_Your_Beauty">Enhancing Your Beauty</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_4">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-23.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-23.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 23" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/50/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-23.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-23.jpg" height="546" id="img_358a29845c" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_358a29845c')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 23" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/50/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-23.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-23.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Understand that you don't need to wear <a href="/Apply-Makeup" title="Apply Makeup">makeup</a> to look beautiful.</b> You should only wear makeup for your own enjoyment, and never because someone tells you to. If people are pressuring you to wear makeup when you really don't want to, ignore them and be yourself.

<ul>
<li>Of course, if wearing makeup makes <i>you</i> feel good about yourself, then go for it.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-24.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-24.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 24" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c0/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-24.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-24.jpg" height="546" id="img_2d59e88b70" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_2d59e88b70')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 24" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c0/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-24.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-24.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Consider keeping your <a href="/Apply-Simple-Every-Day-Makeup" title="Apply Simple Every Day Makeup">makeup simple</a>.</b> Wearing more makeup won't necessarily make you look more beautiful. If anything, it may make you look older and overdressed for the occasion. In fact, most professional makeup artists choose to keep their makeup light and natural during the day. It is only for the evenings and special occasions where they go for the dramatic looks.

<ul>
<li>For a simple, every day look, try a tinted moisturizer, neutral <a href="/Apply-Eyeshadow" title="Apply Eyeshadow">eyeshadow</a>, some mascara, and lip gloss. Keep the blush or bronzer light.</li>
<li>If wearing dramatic makeup makes you happy, then go for it! You might want to give your skin a break every few days, however.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-25.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-25.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 25" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e9/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-25.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-25.jpg" height="546" id="img_3575311293" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_3575311293')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 25" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e9/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-25.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-25.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Try concealer if you have pimples or dark, under eye shadows.</b> <a href="/Apply-Concealer" title="Apply Concealer">Concealer</a> is not mandatory, but it can help cover up problematic areas, such as pimples of under eye shadows. If you feel self-conscious about a pimple, cover it up with some concealer.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 16" class="reference" id="_ref-16"><a href="#_note-16">[16]</a></sup>
<ul>
<li>You don't have to wear concealer with other makeup. You can wear it by itself.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-26.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-26.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 26" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/97/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-26.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-26.jpg" height="546" id="img_bfabdad202" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_bfabdad202')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 26" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/9/97/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-26.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-26.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><a href="/Give-Yourself-a-Manicure" title="Give Yourself a Manicure">Take care of your hands</a>.</b> When it comes to making themselves beautiful, people have tendency to only focus on their face and hair—but hands are important too. Keep your hands soft by wearing a moisturizing hand lotion, and don't pick or chew on your nails. Keep your nails trimmed, and use a manicure brush to clean under them every night. Don't be afraid to paint your nails, or even get a professional manicure. A little bit of color never hurt anyone.

<ul>
<li>If you <i>do</i> choose to paint your nails by yourself, remember to take the old nail polish off first. Wearing nail polish on top of chipped, peeling nail polish will look messy.<sup aria-label="Link to Reference 17" class="reference" id="_ref-17"><a href="#_note-17">[17]</a></sup>
</li>
<li>To protect your nails and make your polish last longer, remember to apply a good base coat before your nail polish, and a good top coat after you are done.</li>
<li>Don't use nail polish as a replacement for proper nail care. Take care of your nails first, then think about nail polish.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-27.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-27.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 27" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4e/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-27.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-27.jpg" height="546" id="img_84445033cb" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_84445033cb')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 27" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/4/4e/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-27.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-27.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_4_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Shave or wax your body hair away.</b> Most girls will just remove the hairs on their legs and underarms, but you can do your forearms too, especially if your hair is thick and coarse. You can also go to a beauty salon or manicure place, and have your eyebrows and upper lip waxed as well. Remember shaving is a personal choice, not a requirement. You don't need to shave to look beautiful.

<ul>
<li>It is not a good idea to pluck or wax your eyebrows by yourself. Getting the right shape can be hard, and it is easy to mess up and over-plus.</li>
<li>If you can't or don't want to wax your eyebrows, groom them instead. Pluck away any unruly hairs, then comb your eyebrows with a clean spoolie brush.</li>
<li>Check with your parents. They might not allow you to shave because of religion or culture.</li>
<li>You can bleach your body hair instead of shaving. Bleaching kits are available at drugstores, makeup stores, etc.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Dressing_for_Yourself_sub"></a><div class="section steps sticky">
<h3>
<div class="altblock"><label class="method_label">Method</label> <span>5</span>
</div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="Dressing_for_Yourself">Dressing for Yourself</span>
</h3>
<div class="section_text" id="steps_5">
<ol class="steps_list_2">
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-28.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-28.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 28" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e2/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-28.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-28.jpg" height="546" id="img_23d5f10b1d" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_23d5f10b1d')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 28" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/e/e2/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-28.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-28.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 1" class="step_num">1</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_1"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Wear what you feel most comfortable in.</b> You may find the hottest, cutest outfit in the mall, but it won't do you any good if you don't feel comfortable or yourself while wearing it. Your lack of confidence will show. Instead of trying to look like everybody else, why not try to make your own style and wear what you feel most comfortable in? Who knows, you might start the next fashion trend.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-29.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-29.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 29" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/00/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-29.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-29.jpg" height="546" id="img_459ed9a88e" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_459ed9a88e')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 29" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/0/00/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-29.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-29.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 2" class="step_num">2</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_2"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Dress up a simple outfit with accessories.</b> You don't <i>have</i> to wear accessories if you don't want to, but they can really make your outfit look more complete. For example, a wide belt over a maxi dress or a simple tunic can really take your outfit to the next level. Choose accessories, such as belts, hats, and jewelry that match your outfit, personality, and style.

<ul>
<li>Look through fashion magazines to get ideas.</li>
<li>Can't afford cute accessories? Make your own!</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-30.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-30.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 30" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/53/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-30.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-30.jpg" height="546" id="img_a4b537fdcc" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_a4b537fdcc')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 30" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/5/53/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-30.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-30.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 3" class="step_num">3</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_3"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Keep your wardrobe clean and tidy.</b> An outfit may look super cute by design, but it won't look cute if it is messy, dirty, or smelly. Take good care of your clothes, and wash them when they get dirty or smelly. You should also take care of the way you put your outfits on. It is fine if you prefer a torn, ragged, "punk" look, but try not to be sloppy about it.

<ul>
<li>When washing your clothes, read the how-to-wash tags. If you don't wash certain garments properly, you could ruin them.</li>
<li>Always wash white clothes separately from colored clothes. If you wash them with other colors, they may turn dingy. This will make them look dirty, even if they are clean.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-31.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-31.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 31" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fe/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-31.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-31.jpg" height="546" id="img_6ff61325bf" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_6ff61325bf')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 31" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/f/fe/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-31.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-31.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 4" class="step_num">4</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_4"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb">Emphasize the part of your body you feel most confident about yourself.</b> Wear vibrant tops if you like your upper body/arms and slimming pants if you love your legs. If you don't feel good about <i>any</i> part of your body, ask a friend (or even a friendly sales associate) to help you find an outfit that will look cute on you. Sometimes, it is easier to see what looks good on other people than it is on yourself—your friend might be able to see something that you don't.

<ul>
<li>Don't be afraid to experiment with different looks. Head over to a store and try on some things you wouldn't normally wear--you might be surprised!</li>
<li>Of course, you should still wear things that you feel comfortable in. Even if people tell you that it looks great, if <i>you</i> don't feel comfortable in it, don't wear it.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-32.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-32.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 32" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3f/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-32.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-32.jpg" height="546" id="img_252cb63d0a" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_252cb63d0a')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 32" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/3/3f/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-32.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-32.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 5" class="step_num">5</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_5"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><a href="/Dress-for-Your-Body-Type" title="Dress for Your Body Type">Dress for your body type</a>.</b> There is an outfit for everyone out there. Whether you are skinny or overweight, you can still wear similar clothes, such as shorts and tank tops. What matters, however, is the cut. For example:

<ul>
<li>If you have narrow shoulders, you'd look better in tank tops that have thinner straps.</li>
<li>If you have broader shoulders, you'd look better in tank tops that have wider straps.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-33.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-33.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 33" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c2/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-33.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-33.jpg" height="546" id="img_97ddd50385" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_97ddd50385')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 33" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/c/c2/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-33.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-33.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 6" class="step_num">6</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_6"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><a href="/Be-Kind" title="Be Kind">Be kind.</a></b> Being kind is one of the easiest things to do to look prettier. Think: you could be the prettiest girl on the outside, but you may be really mean. Would you want to be that girl, or would you want to be the kind, friendly girl everyone wants to talk to?

<ul>
<li>There is more to true kindness than just nice words and compliments. Try to have kind thoughts about others too.</li>
<li>One of the easiest ways to be kind is to be sympathetic and understanding.</li>
</ul>
</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
<li class="hasimage final_li">
<div class="mwimg largeimage floatcenter" style="max-width:728px"><a class="image lightbox" data-href="/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-34.jpg?ajax=true&aid=104251" href="#/Image:Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-34.jpg"><div class="content-spacer">
<img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 34" class="whcdn content-fill" data-src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/25/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-34.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-34.jpg" height="546" id="img_193f46b770" width="728"/><script>WH.shared.addScrollLoadItem('img_193f46b770')</script>
</div>
<noscript><img alt="Image titled Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl Step 34" class="whcdn content-fill" height="546" src="https://www.wikihow.com/images/thumb/2/25/Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-34.jpg/aid104251-v4-728px-Look-Beautiful-As-a-Teenage-Girl-Step-34.jpg" width="728"/></noscript></a></div>
<div aria-label="Step 7" class="step_num">7</div>
<a class="stepanchor" name="step_5_7"></a><div class="step">
<b class="whb"><a href="/Be-Yourself" title="Be Yourself">Be Yourself</a>.</b> Whoever you are and however you look, own it. Beauty is a mindset. Feel beautiful, and you will be beautiful. Just look in the mirror. You don't need a wiki page to remind you that you rock.

</div>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</li>
</ol>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<a class="anchor" name="Questions_and_Answers_sub"></a>
<div class="qa section sticky" data-aid="104251" data-few_contribs="1" data-search_enabled="0">
<h2>
<div class="altblock"></div>
<span class="mw-headline" id="qa_headline">Community Q&A</span>
</h2>
<div class="section_text" id="qa">
<div id="qa_answered_questions_container">
<div id="qa_aq_search_container">
<div class="qa_section_heading" id="qa_aq_search_heading">Search</div>
<input class="qa_aq_search" placeholder="Type your query here"/>
</div>
<a id="qa_add_curated_question"></a>
<ul class="qa_questions qa_aqs qa_waittheresmore" id="qa_article_questions">
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="121382" data-caid="122255" data-cqid="121399" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="406123" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="3" data-votes_up="66">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">Is it ok for someone with pimples to apply makeup?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Yes, it is okay, but you might want to give your face a few days' break every now and then. Keep your makeup light, and be sure to wash it off well at the end of the day before you go to sleep.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>3</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>66</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="13412" data-caid="14278" data-cqid="13422" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="68258" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="24" data-votes_up="281">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How do I remove darkspots below my eyes without harming my face?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Have you ever seen shows where people wear cucumber slices over their eyes? This is supposed to reduce darkness and puffiness, if you take the cucumber straight from the fridge. If you have makeup, you can also use foundation and concealer to cover the spots. Getting enough sleep should make them less noticeable as well.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>24</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>281</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="121383" data-caid="122256" data-cqid="121400" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="815476" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="6" data-votes_up="94">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">I never put makeup on my face, but still I have a pimples. How is this possible? </div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Pimples are often caused by other things, such as diet, not washing your face often enough, touching your face excessively, and hormonal changes. Be sure to wash your face twice a day, and try not to touch it too often. Also, be sure to eat plenty of fruits and vegetables, and avoid junk food, such as pizza and chips.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>6</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>94</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="121390" data-caid="122263" data-cqid="121407" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="700437" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="4" data-votes_up="63">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">How can I be thinner without exercise?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Try to eat healthy, with plenty of fruits and vegetables. Cut down on junk food and sweets. The most important thing is to NOT starve yourself. Also, do try to get some exercise in each week, even if it is as simple as a walk to the store. Exercise helps keep you healthy, not just skinny. </div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>4</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>63</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="121394" data-caid="122267" data-cqid="121411" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="705949" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="11" data-votes_up="121">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">Do I need to stop eating to not be fat?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">NO! This would be a terrible idea! In fact, not eating can cause your body to enter "starvation mode," and store more fat! In order to lose weight, you must eat well and you must eat healthy. Eat full meals, but make them count; eat plenty of fruits, veggies, whole grains, and lean meats. Also, remember to drink lots of water!</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>11</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>121</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="129181" data-caid="130054" data-cqid="129198" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="161977" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="10" data-votes_up="101">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">Will this help boys notice me?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">It can, but remember that looks aren't everything. A pretty face might get you the attention you want, but your personality also matters. Also, keep in mind that everyone has different ideas of what's beautiful. Lastly, choose a boy who likes you for WHO you are, not what you look like.</div>
<div class="qa_answer_footer">
<div class="wh_vote_container qa_vote_buttons">
<span class="wh_thumb_response wh_thumb_msg">Thanks!</span>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_links">
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">Yes</a>
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box button secondary" href="#">No</a>
</div>
<div class="qa_widget_vote_buttons">
<a class="wh_vote_down wh_vote_box" href="#">Not Helpful <span>10</span></a>
<a class="wh_vote_up wh_vote_box" href="#">Helpful <span>101</span></a>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</div>
</li>
<li class="qa_aq qa_block" data-aqid="13409" data-caid="14275" data-cqid="13419" data-qa_inactive="0" data-sqid="48580" data-submitter_id="0" data-verifier_id="0" data-votes_down="40" data-votes_up="283">
<div class="qa_divider"></div>
<div class="qa_li_container">
<div class="qa_question_tab">Question</div>
<div class="qa_q_txt question">If you wear makeup do you get pimples?</div>
<div class="qa_answers">
<div class="qa_user_area">
<div class="qa_user_hover hint_box"></div>
<div class="qa_badge"></div>
<div class="qa_person_circle"></div>
<div class="qa_answerer_info">
<div class="qa_user_name"></div>
<div class="qa_user_label">Community Answer</div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="qa_answer answer">Yes, makeup can cause pimples. Look for "non-comedogenic" and "hypoallergenic" makeup that's less likely to clog pores or irritate skin. Always wash it off before bed.</div>

<div class="qa_q_txt question">How do I get rid of body odour?</div>

<div class="qa_user_name"></div>

<div class="qa_answer answer">Shower more often using body wash and/or soap with a pleasant smell, and finish with perfume or deodorant. Shower after you exercise to wash off sweat.</div>

<div class="section tips sticky">
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Tips">Tips</span></h2>
<div class="section_text" id="tips">
<ul>
<li>A positive attitude and self-acceptance make a huge difference. Walk confidently and smile.</li>
<li>Try not to worry too much about what everyone else thinks of you. Sometimes we can be overly self-conscious about something, when no one else really notices.</li>
<li>Everyone has a different idea of what's beautiful. Focus on what <i>you</i> think is beautiful.</li>
<li>You should also use your time on the best way and always keep having fun and try to smile.</li>
<li>Smile often, and take good care of it. This means brushing and flossing everyday, and visiting the dentist.</li>
<li>Drinking warm water with a squeeze of lemon in the morning will help remove toxins from your skin and body.</li>
<li>Walk with your shoulders and back straight—don't slouch.</li>
<li>Don't forget to have a kind and friendly personality; it will add to your look.</li>
<li>Socialize more instead of being shy or always looking at your phone. Talking to people in person makes you seem more friendly and approachable.</li>
<li>If you have curly hair, see a specialist. <i>Curly hair is not straight hair. It is not cut the same, it does not look the same.</i>
</li>
</ul>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>
</div>
<div class="section warnings sticky">
<h2><span class="mw-headline" id="Warnings">Warnings</span></h2>
<div class="section_text" id="warnings">
<ul>
<li>Do not smoke, drink, or do drugs. They will make you look tired and unhealthy. Plus, they are bad for your body.</li>
<li>Do not worry about your weight. Regular exercise is good. Build up your exercising routines as you get more fit.</li>
<li>Beware of harsh facial cleansers, they dry out your skin.</li>
</ul>
<div class="clearall"></div>
</div>

    "description": "How to Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl. Looking beautiful is one of the things many teenager girls strive to be. Luckily, it is not hard to do, although it does take some time and effort. There is much more to looking beautiful than..."
}</script><script type="application/ld+json">{
    "@context": "http:\/\/schema.org",
    "@type": "HowTo",

    "name": "Look Beautiful As a Teenage Girl",

        "width": 1200,
        "height": 900
    },
    "author": {
